item.title: Teaching
item.description: Ecological Models and Data (Instructor for recitation), Spring 2019 I was the recitationinstructor for BIO133 Ecological Models and Data course at Tufts University. I taught students how to use program R and RMardown to run the statistics and ecological models learned in lecture. Biostatistics (Instructor for recitation), Fall 2017 I redesigned and taught the recitation section for the BIO132 Biostatistics course at Tufts University with another graduate student, Eric Scott.
